t: Brands You Can't Find on Amazon
s: Not every brand wants to be on Amazon. Many luxury brands such as Louis Vuitton aren't available on the platform. Others, such as NIke, are beginning to pull from the site due to counterfeiting and scam issues.

t: Amazon Sellers: No Brand? No Problem, with Generic Brands - EcommerceBytes
s: October 9, 2023 - Amazon historically does nothing, enforces nothing on a consistent basis. That means that this will be abused heavily because sellers know this is something they have to make effort to catch and enforce. They have very little control over the catalog as it is.

t: Can I just sell a product on Amazon without having my brand on it? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): The way it works with selling (in case you are really new with this) is that the thing you offer and what you post about your offer must be the same. You can’t offer a thing with one name and then send something with another name. Not without consequences, starting with an angr...
